flawed_nl_solution:
If Jocelyn bought the car 3 years ago at $4000, the car's value has reduced by 3/10*$4000=$40000/3
The current value of the car is $4000-$40000/3 = $<<4000-40000/3=-28000/3>>-28000/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 40000/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
